news.summary: The creator economy is evolving fast, and ad revenue alone isn’t cutting it anymore. YouTubers are launching product lines, acquiring startups, and building actual business empires. In fact, MrBeast’s company bought fintech startup Step,

news.title: Remember HQ? ‘Quiz Daddy’ Scott Rogowsky is back with TextSavvy, a daily mobile game show
news.summary: The former HQ host Scott Rogowsky is back with TextSavvy, a live mobile game show that he's building on his own terms.

news.title: Anthropic-funded group backs candidate attacked by rival AI super PAC
news.summary: Dueling pro-AI PACs have centered around backing or targeting one New York congressional bid: Alex Bores, whose RAISE Act requires AI developers to disclose safety protocols and report serious system misuse.

news.title: Apple’s iOS 26.4 arrives in public beta with AI music playlists, video podcasts, and more
news.summary: Several updates are introduced in iOS 26.4, including an AI-powered playlist-generation feature in Apple Music, support for video content in the Podcasts app, end-to-end encryption (E2EE) for RCS messages, and more.

news.title: The best e-reader to buy right now
news.summary: Any ebook reader will let you cram a Beauty and the Beast-sized library’s worth of books in your pocket, but so will your phone. news.title: Xbox shakeup: Phil Spencer and Sarah Bond are leaving Microsoft
news.summary: After nearly 40 years at Microsoft, Xbox chief and Microsoft Gaming CEO Phil Spencer is leaving the company, along with Xbox president Sarah Bond. news.title: SCOTUS rules Trump’s tariffs are illegal — but the fight is far from over
news.summary: The US Supreme Court struck down some of Donald Trump's tariffs on foreign imports, which have become a hallmark of the chaos of the second Trump administration. news.title: Trump Imposes New Tariffs to Sidestep Supreme Court Ruling
news.summary: The president signed an executive order implementing 10 percent global tariffs after calling the justices who struck down his signature trade policy a “disgrace.”

news.title: The Supreme Court’s Tariff Ruling Won’t Bring Car Prices Back to Earth
news.summary: Despite Friday’s SCOTUS ruling, many tariffs affecting the auto industry will remain. So will the other dynamics that have led to today’s historically high car prices.

news.title: A Galaxy Composed Almost Entirely of Dark Matter Has Been Confirmed
news.summary: What scientists thought were four separate star clusters are actually part of one nearly invisible system.
